      public void updateTournament(int id, String name, String rankRequirement, String otherRequirement, String date, String time)
      Method used to update a tournament in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the selected tournament ID
      name - the new name of the tournament
      rankRequirement - the new rank requirement
      otherRequirement - the new general requirement
      date - the new date
      time - the new time

      Parameters:
      tournamentId - the id of the tournament
      status - the new status (for example "Finished" or "Group stage")
